subject: Re: Definitely unslung
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

On Thu, Jun 07, 2007 at 09:33:40AM EST, Travis Siegel wrote:
> Actually, the switch to intel wasn't all that bad of a plan.

No it wasn't, but I am no longer as interested in macs as I was when 
they were PowerPC. I really only like OS X for the unix side of things, 
and the relative ease in porting to it. If I wasn't planning on working 
on future projects that had OS X ports, I would even be considering 
getting an Intel mac in the future.
- -- 
Luke Yelavich
